content:
"""
Ah, we need to craft the inserter again before placing it. Let's do a complete setup with proper crafting sequence.
"""

# First ensure we have iron plates
furnaces = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})
for furnace in furnaces:
    extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=10)

# Craft a new inserter
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=1)  # Inserter needs gears
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter)

# Get our existing drill
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]

# Rotate drill to output in the right direction
rotate_entity(drill, Direction.RIGHT)

# Place inserter at drill's drop position
move_to(drill.drop_position)
inserter = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=drill.drop_position)
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.RIGHT)

# Add fuel to inserter
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=5)

# Refill furnaces with iron ore
furnaces = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})
for furnace in furnaces:
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace.position, quantity=20)

# Verify final setup
print(f"Final setup:")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Drill drop position: {drill.drop_position}")
print(f"Inserter position: {inserter.position if inserter else 'Not placed'}")
